summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 JAYCO GRAYHAWK CLASS C RV. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 11V494000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED IN REGARDS TO THE REPAIR BECAUSE THE NEAREST AUTHORIZED DEALER TO THE CONTACT WAS OVER ONE HOUR AWAY. THE MANUFACTURER OFFERED TO PAY A LOCAL REPAIR SHOP TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE, BUT THEY COULD NOT AGREE ON A PRICE TO REMEDY THE VEHICLE. THE MANUFACTURER WOULD NOT REIMBURSE THE CONTACT FOR THE REPAIRS IF HE WERE TO PAY A LOCAL REPAIR SHOP TO HAVE THE RECALL REPAIR PERFORMED.  THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 8000.
